title: Web-Based Self-Directed Collaborative Learning Program for Applying Occupational Therapy Activity Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic occupational therapy concepts and experience in human activity observation
context.additional_context: Establishing real-time interaction and feedback systems using mobile devices, organizing small-group collaborative learning environments with peer learners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three real-world cases by applying a task activity analysis framework
Learners can revise over 80% of items in activity analysis reports through peer collaborative feedback
Learners can improve self-assessment capabilities by 50% by comparing with standard answers provided in web-based systems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
